pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dependent Gaussian Processes for Longitudinal Correlated Factors // Functionalities for analyzing high-dimensional and longitudinal biomarker data to facilitate precision medicine, using a joint model of Bayesian sparse factor analysis and dependent Gaussian processes. This paper illustrates the method in detail: J Cai, RJB Goudie, C Starr, BDM Tom (2023) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2307.02781.
